title: The Watch
description: From the author Kirkus Reviews calls "hottest of all" comes "a fantastic series" with "a touch of class" ...Sneaking out after curfew, avoiding the cameras and the guards--Red has done it a thousand times. But tonight is different. Tonight she gets caught.* FINALIST in The Wishing Shelf Book Awards *A hit with adult and teen readers alike, THE RED SERIES brings a fresh twist to dystopian fiction. Perfect for fans of the Hunger Games, Divergent, and Maze Runner series.Raised in a walled city, constantly watched and controlled, Red longs for freedom. Then a crisis comes, and she learns the truth: You can go into the woods; you might even come back again. But you will never be the same.
author: Amanda Witt
